record.field: CELGA
Certificado de Estudos de Lingua Galega
Pruebas de evaluación de nivel del idioma gallego organizadas por la Secretaría General de Política Lingüística, entidad dependiente de la Junta de Galicia.
IVAP
Instituto Vasco de Administración Pública
Issues Basque language certificates for personnel working in a public administration (local, provincial or regional) in the Basque Country
Ertzaintza
Ertzaintza — Autonomous Police of the Basque Country
Basque autonomous police. Issues Basque language profile certificates for its staff.
HABE
HABE — Helduen Alfabetatze eta Berreuskalduntzerako Erakundea
Public body for adult Basque language learning (historically HABE). Provides CEFR-aligned certificates (A1–C2) through the euskaltegi network.
Euskara
Euskara — Other Certificates
Neutral group for Euskara certificates not issued by IVAP/HABE (e.g., EGA, HLEA).
CAT-DGPL
Generalitat de Catalunya — Certificats de Català
Official Catalan language certificates issued by the Direcció General de Política Lingüística (Catalonia). CEFR-aligned (A1–C2).
JQCV
Junta Qualificadora de Coneixements de Valencià (JQCV)
Official Valencian (Catalan) certificates issued by the Generalitat Valenciana through the JQCV. CEFR-aligned (A1–C2).
